readable.title: 2360194369_d2fd03b337
readable.content: a boy with a fishing pole looking down on a lake A little boy looks over the railing on the dock into the blue water . A young boy in a red coat fishes off a pier and looks down at the water . A young boy in a red jacket stands on a pier with a fishing pole and chair near him . The boy wearing the red top is standing by a fishing rod looking over the jetty fence .
